hash.description: The hash of this transaction encoded as hex.

miniBlockHash.description: The miniblock hash in which the transaction was included encoded as hex.

blockHash.description: The block hash in which the transaction was included encoded as hex.

round.description: The round when this transaction was processed.

receiver.description: The receiver address of this transaction encoded as hex.

sender.description: The sender address of this transaction encoded as hex.

receiverShard.description: Uint32 representation of the shard id  in which the receiver account is located.

senderShard.description: Uint32 representation of the shard id  in which the sender account is located.
